name: Pigeon Protocol
description:
Play with up to 10 of your friends in this frantic bird-based online game! Customize your pigeon, compete to build nests, own territory and keep hold of shiny things. But watch out, it’s a bird eat bird world out there!

Fun Gamemodes!

Pick from 3 game modes to play with your friends. Build nests, fight over shiny things and battle to keep hold of your territory!

Maps!

Pick from 4 different maps to play on!

Fun flying and gliding mechanics!

Fly and glide around to your heart’s content.

Customize your bird!

Personalize your bird by giving yourself a custom name, hats and custom colors to make you stand out from the flock.

Combat!

Use your claws and beak to defend yourself and keep your enemies at bay.
